title: Item Sets tied to account data
body: Hey Riot, I was wondering what the constraints are that prevents item set data from being stored with account data rather than locally like it is now.

replies.body:
The default recommended item set is designed and tailored to individual champions by the very experienced players such as phreak who involved in the design of very fabric of this game.

You dare question their judgment?!

Someone ban him!

well there are arguments for both. Having it stored on site means that after an update, you would have to still redownload it, causing additional download size, but would allow item sets to persist over client repairs.

Having it client side would mean you can add additional item sets when not connected to the net. Such with LSI. I would also like it so that i can save a back up of them so i dont lose them when i repair my client. 

WHICH btw, i dont know the file path of the item sets, if anyone know plz post.
